TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientCredentials extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 讓使用者設定可用於通訊之用戶端的用戶端和服務認證，以及服務認證驗證設定。

span.span: Enables the user to configure client and service credentials as well as service credential authentication settings for use on the client side of communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可透過 類別的 屬性存取。The is accessed through the property of the class. 物件會新增至 集合。A object is added to the collection. 屬性是*外觀*（知名的設計模式） 移轉該集合中的項目。The property is a *Façade* (a well-known design pattern) over an entry in that collection. 這個類別中的大多數屬性都會傳回組成多數屬性的物件。Many properties in this class return objects that consist mainly of properties. 這些物件可以用於組態：當 `get` 物件之後，您就可以呼叫其成員，使用它來 `set` 屬性。These objects can be used for configuration: once you `get` the object, you can use it to `set` properties by calling its members. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何覆寫這個類別以及實作您自己的自訂用戶端認證，其中包含自訂安全性權杖管理員。The following code sample shows how to override this class and implement your own custom client credentials that includes a custom security token manager. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請注意，覆寫 方法以建立自訂安全性權杖管理員是很重要的。It is important to note that the method is overridden to create a custom security token manager. 衍生自 的安全性權杖管理員，The security token manager, derived from . 必須傳回衍生自 的自訂安全性權杖提供者，以建立實際的安全性權杖。must return a custom security token provider, derived from , to create the actual security token. 如果並未依照這個模式建立安全性權杖，應用程式的安全性就會有受攻擊的風險，特別是在提高權限時。If you do not follow this pattern for creating security tokens, your application will be at risk for security attacks, specifically elevation of privileges. 此編碼模式可確保快取通道處理站時，使用正確的認證。This coding pattern ensures that the correct credentials are used when channel factories are cached. [!code-csharp[c_CustomCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customcredentials/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_CustomCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customcredentials/vb/client/client.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前的 HTTP 摘要式認證。

span.span: A that represents the credential that the client uses to authenticate to the service when the HTTP Digest authentication method is chosen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性傳回的物件，透過呼叫 屬性來設定認證。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the credential by calling the property. 同樣地，如果網路認證不同於目前的執行緒權杖，您就可以指定要使用的網路認證。Similarly, you can specify the network credential to use if it is different from the current thread's token. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何使用這個屬性來設定認證使用者名稱和密碼。The following code shows how to use this property to set the credentials user name and password. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuedToken As IssuedTokenClientCredential

summary.span: 使用這個屬性，即可指定要在連絡本機安全性權杖服務時使用的端點位址和繫結。

span.span: Use this property to specify the endpoint address and binding to use when contacting your local Security Token Service.

summary.span: 當服務要求以發行的權杖進行驗證，但是服務的原則 (表示為用戶端上的繫結) 卻未明確指定如何及從何處取得發行的權杖時，就會使用這份資訊。

span.span: This information is used when a service requires authentication using an issued token, but the policy of the service (represented as a binding on the client) does not explicitly specify how and where to obtain the issued token.

value.span: ，指定要用於從本機安全性權杖服務取得權杖的參數。

span.span: An that specifies parameters to be used to obtain a token from a local Security Token Service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用由這個屬性傳回的物件，透過呼叫其成員來設定本機安全性權杖服務的設定。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the settings of the local Security Token Service by calling its members. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何使用這個屬性取得 的執行個體。The following code shows how to get an instance of by means of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServiceCertificate As X509CertificateRecipientClientCredential

summary.span: 取得用於指定服務之 X.509 憑證的物件。

span.span: Gets an object used to specify a service's X.509 certificate.

value.span: ，表示要用於特定服務的憑證。

span.span: An that represents the certificate to use for a particular service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用由這個屬性傳回的物件，透過呼叫其成員來設定憑證的屬性。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the certificate's properties by calling its members. 您可以指定單一預設憑證，以及要在與特定 URI 通訊時使用的不同憑證。You can specify a single default certificate as well as a different certificate to be used when communicating with a particular URI. 您也可以透過這個類別，控制經由執行於訊息層之 SSL/TLS 交涉進行交涉之服務憑證的驗證設定。Through this class, you also control the authentication settings for service certificates negotiated through SSL/TLS negotiation performed at the message level. 這個屬性不一定要指定。This property does not always have to be specified. 是否需要這個屬性，要依據與服務通訊所使用之繫結上所設定的驗證模式和交涉選項而定。Whether it is required depends on the authentication mode and negotiation options set on the binding that is used to communicate with the service. 控制這個行為的部分相關類別有 和 。Some relevant classes that control this behavior are and . 您也可以設定此值使用[<憑證>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set this value using the [<certificate>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 這段程式碼將示範如何使用這個屬性來取得服務的憑證及設定其屬性。This code shows how to use this property to get the service's certificate and set its properties. [!code-csharp[c_CreateSTS#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_creatests/cs/source.cs#33)]

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件會用於控制用戶端在向服務驗證本身時所使用的 Windows 認證。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用由這個屬性傳回的物件，透過呼叫其成員 (例如 和 ) 來設定 Windows 認證。You can use the object returned by this property to configure the Windows credential by calling its members, such as and . 這些設定會控制於 SPNEGO 交涉期間在訊息層或傳輸層使用的 Windows 認證，或用於在訊息層驗證之 Kerberos 權杖的屬性。These settings control the Windows credential used during SPNEGO negotiation at either the message or transport level or the properties of Kerberos tokens used for authentication at the message level. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用由這個屬性傳回的物件來設定模擬層級。The following code shows how to use the object returned by this property to configure the impersonation level. [!code-csharp[S_UEClientCredentials#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclientcredentials/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEClientCredentials#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclientcredentials/vb/program.vb#5)]
